text: Josua nguaziba abɨgha me ganɨdima, Judan gumazir maba iza Gilgalɨn a bagha ize. Ezɨ Kenasian gumazim Jefune, an otarim Kalep, Josua bagha iza a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ fo, e Kades Barnean ikiavɨra itir dughiamɨn, Ikiavɨra Itir God, ga bagh damuamin biziba bar dar gun uan ingangarir gumazim Moses mɨkeme.
